name: Sarhua Match
description:
Sarhua Match is a matching tiles puzzle game, where characteristic elements of Sarhua Paintings have been adapted as the tiles to be matched.

On the main screen as well as on the menu you can see pieces made by the artisan Milagros Ramos Romaní milirr_sarhua(winner along with her mother Maria Luisa of the Violet Mask Contest held by PNUD Peru).

It also includes typical music from the town of Sarhua, Ayacucho, remixed for the game and finally a section about this family workshop of artisans from Sarhua “Ramos Romani” located in Chorrillos, Lima.
